**R Packages Needed**

```{r packages, message=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
library(raster)
```

## load and plot

```{r sideBySide, fig.height=6.5, fig.width = 10}
# file names
imageDir <- 'S:/Users/xutianfa/Irrigation/poster_files/data/RRB'
eviName <- 'sideBySide_EVI.tif'
className <- 'sideBySide_classifiedmap.tif'

evi <- raster(paste0(imageDir, '/',eviName))
class <- raster(paste0(imageDir, '/', className))

# make an EVI palette
EviPal = colorRampPalette(c('#ffffff', '#CE7E45', '#F1B555', '#FCD163', '#99B718',
  '#74A901', '#66A000', '#529400', '#3E8601', '#207401', '#056201',
  '#004C00', '#023B01', '#012E01', '#011D01', '#011301'))  

par(bty = 'n', mfrow=c(1,2), mar=c(.1,0,.1,0)) 
plot(evi, col=EviPal(18), axes=F, legend=F, breaks=c(seq(0,1,length.out=17),4))
plot(class, col = c('gray80','darkgreen'), axes=F, legend = F)
```
